member.name: T:SkorkEngineAPI.Language.Compile.SkorkCompile
member.summary:
The class.
This class uses a instance to compile Skork code.

member.name: M:SkorkEngineAPI.Language.Compile.SkorkCompile.CompileSkorkCode(Skork.Language.Parse.SkorkParser)
member.summary:
Attempts to parse potential Skork code into it's native SkorkReadableFormat.
Invoking this method will clean the code, format it for the compiler to understand, and attempt to compile.
Returns compilation notes using ints. 0 is successful.
